text:
What better way to start a Monday at 7am at 7F with fogged-up near-frozen glasses than to get #2/2 #COVID19 #vaccine @MayoClinic!
Thank you Dr. @AbinashVirkMD, Dr. Melanie Swift & team for making this a seamless and safe operation. We shall be forever #grateful 😊@MayoClinicGIHep https://t.co/DVBz5JelbH
